title: Introduction to Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
description: Welcome to the comprehensive course on Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics! This course provides hands-on experience with humanoid robots (Unitree Go2/G1), sensor systems (RealSense, IMU), and AI platforms (Jetson Orin) through a structured curriculum with 5 modules and a capstone project.

next.title: AI's Impact on K-12 Classroom Efficiency
